Literature.Title: Expanding the potential of NAI-107 for treating serious ESKAPE pathogens: synergistic combinations against Gram-negatives and bactericidal activity against non-dividing cells.
Literature.Author: Brunati C, Thomsen TT, Gaspari E, Maffioli S, Sosio M, Jabes D, Løbner-Olesen A, Donadio S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Haemophilus Influenzae(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Moraxella catarrhalis(MIC=0.25-1µg/ml),Neisseria meningitidis(MIC=0.06-1µg/ml),Neisseria gonorrhoeae ATCC 49226(MIC=0.25µg/ml),Neisseria gonorrhoeae(MIC=0.25-1µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=128µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>256µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=>256µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>256µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 10145(MIC=>256µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 25668(MIC=>256µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>256µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii CR17(MIC=>128µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>128µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17904(MIC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MU50(MIC=2µg/ml)
